The error occurs when the preview is selected. 
On an existing report the layout never appears. 
On a new report the layout will appear.
Both new and existing reports receive the same erroe when preview is selected.

Fixed the FontData issue. Regarding the second browser issue, please ensure latest Mozilla browser is installed, SWT uses Mozilla browser in motif environment.
Thank you very much for your very quick response. Can I obtain the fix?

About the second problem. I looked on the machine that I am running on and found that Mozilla 1.7.13. At least that is what help about on the browser says. I looked at the IBM web site and that is the latest Mozilla. 
Anything else we can look at or try?
